subject: Marching Bands
Music
Football
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Changing the words to a verse of the university fight song to ridicule the 0-9 football team during a 62-41 loss to Cornell got the Columbia band briefly banned from Saturday’s game against Brown.
snippet: Changing the words to a verse of the university fight song to ridicule the 0-9 football team during a 62-41 loss to Cornell got the Columbia band briefly banned from Saturday’s game against Brown.
